Description: A brush entity, which receives damage from all normal damage sources, such as weapon fire, and can, eventually, break from it, spilling some debris/gibs in its place.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, this func_breakable will only break when triggered, even if its health value is set to '1'.
If set, this func_breakable will break as soon as a player touches it. If a delay before fire is set, the func_breakable will wait for that to run out before breaking after a touch.
If set, the func_breakable can be destroyed from pressure, as is e.g. inflicted by a func_train, regardless of the train's damage.

If set, this func_breakable can be repaired, as in, have its health restored, by a player 'attacking' it with [weapon_pipewrenches'](../weapon_pipewrench) primary attack, for the amount of that weapon's primary damage value.
If set, the func_breakable will show HUD info for players looking at it. This is not affected by CVar 'mp_allowmonsterinfo'.
If set, the func_breakable will be immune to player attacks.
If set, this func_breakable will break instantly if hit with a crowbar.
If set, this func_breakable can be damaged by explosives only.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Entity to trigger when func_breakable breaks. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.
Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to break it. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can be kill-targeted.
Entity to remove when func_breakable breaks.
Name to display when player is looking at this func_breakable. Requires "Show HUD Info" flag selected
Sets the minimum light level. Set this value if entity is too dark on compiled map. Also useful for things like computer screens or holograms. Default is 0, max 1.
